channel.title: Adding Talk-to option to a Monster
channel.description: Title says it basically I don't know how to do that or if thats even possible, I'm using a Dementhium 637 source. Regardless of the source can anybody help ? I want a monster to be able to talk and maybe even have a shop

item.title: Adding Talk-to option to a Monster
item.dc:creator: @Frostyelve Frostyelve
item.description:
@Frostyelve wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:3, topic:421087”]If you don’t know how to add a shop, go back to 317 Delta…[/quote] Didn’t ask how to make a shop, still looking for help!

Read full topic
